channel.title: Vanguard: Saga of Heroes
channel.description:
I guess it's a new game that's supposed to be coming out this winter, atleast that's what I've heard.
Some cool features include transportation(boats,mounts), property(houses, now instanced houses, houses out in the open because it's supposed to be an [b]enormous[/b] amount of space/area, and I guess vendors in your houses, I think,) and a very wide variety of races and classes. I'd like everyone to check it out because it looks like it will be really, really cool. I think someone mentioned to me that it would cost $10 a month, which is perfectly fine with me, because it will be a lot better than WoW, and costs less. :)
Check it out at http://www.vanguardsoh.com

item.title: Vanguard: Saga of Heroes
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

This looks retarded. It’s made by the same people who made “Everquest”.

The class list is especially stupid.

Protective Fighters Dread Knight Inquisitor Paladin Warrior

Offensive Fighters
Bard
Berserker
Monk
Ranger
Rogue

Healers
Blood Mage
Cleric
Disciple
Shaman

Arcane Casters
Druid
Necromancer
Psionicist
Sorcerer

A druid is never an arcane caster. A disciple and a shaman are both clerics. A bard is not an offensive fighter, neither is a rogue. They need to learn some fucking basics about roleplaying games.

Read full topic

item.title: Vanguard: Saga of Heroes
item.dc:creator: @leader leader
item.description:
@leader wrote:

wixter:

guildwars shall own all!

I don’t like guildwars…I still play diablo 2 exp.[br][size=1]Posted at: September 14, 2006, 06:15:12 PM[/size][hr]This game looks good. If there are necromancers, druids, or rangers. I am definitely in.
